pr_title: Support JDK 11 compiling and upgrade dependencies

timeline.message: Upgrade dependencies and make the JDK11 compiling passed.
Update license and fix license check file.
Add bytebuddy and objenesis for mockito for test env in JDK11.
Fix Spring boot 1.x testing in JDK11.

timeline.bodyText: @kezhenxu94 @dmsolr @JaredTan95 This test can't pass on the GitHub Action's JDK11, but passed on the local JDK 11.
timeline.author: wu-sheng

replies.bodyText:
At the GitHub Linux JDK1 env, this causes

jdk.internal.loader.ClassLoaderValue (in module java.base) because module java.base does not export jdk.internal.loader to unnamed module

NOTE, I changed the ignore to @PowerMockIgnore({"com.sun.org.apache.xerces.*", "javax.xml.*", "org.xml.*", "javax.management.*", "org.w3c.*"})
replies.author: wu-sheng
